c8f3e101-7c7d-47ca-a9a0-8bc1aaa32229.description: The Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle recognizes individuals who have contributed significantly to the promotion of leadership and education initiatives in ways that stand out in the eyes of the recipient's seniors, subordinates, and peers. These individuals demonstrate the highest standards of integrity and moral character, display an outstanding degree of professional competence, and serve their community of practice with distinction.
c8f3e101-7c7d-47ca-a9a0-8bc1aaa32229.name: Bronze Member, Honorable Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification
alignments.description: National Board Certification is the most respected professional certification available in Leadership and provides numerous benefits to employers, students and organizations. It was designed to develop, retain and recognize accomplished leaders and to generate ongoing improvement and develop organizations and individuals' nationwide.

badge_template_activities.title: The popular and prestigious Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle is designed to recognize those who promote the success of leadership, the NBLC mission, profession, and community. The legend of St. John Baptist de La Salle is a story of those who devote themselves wholeheartedly to their community, the development, and the success of others.

Awardees will have served in a variety of positions, with differing titles and occasionally a non-standard grade structure. The key criteria are distinguished service and what was accomplished to advance and improve their community of practice during that period of service. The intent is that the nominee will have served in a leadership position(s) and made significant and/or long-lasting contribution(s) to the community.

This award is designed to recognize an individual’s long-term support and legacy. While there is no specific time period for this award, it is NOT normally represented by a single assignment or achievement unless recognizing an enduring achievement.

17c0738a-5afd-4bff-9de5-c645a2db11e4.description: The Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle recognizes individuals who have contributed significantly to the promotion of leadership and education initiatives in ways that stand out in the eyes of the recipient's seniors, subordinates, and peers. These individuals demonstrate the highest standards of integrity and moral character, display an outstanding degree of professional competence, and serve their community of practice with distinction.
17c0738a-5afd-4bff-9de5-c645a2db11e4.name: Silver Member, Honorable Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: The popular and prestigious Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle is designed to recognize individuals who promote the success of leadership, the NBLC mission, profession, and community. The legend of St. John Baptist de La Salle is a story of those who devote themselves wholeheartedly to their community, the development, and the success of others.

Awardees will have served in a variety of positions, with differing titles and occasionally a non-standard grade structure. The key criteria are distinguished service and what was accomplished to advance and improve their community of practice during that period of service.

This award is designed to recognize an individual’s long-term support and legacy with significant and long-lasting impact to their communities and the NBLC. Nominees must have a career in leadership, education or service. While there is no specific time period for this award, it is NOT normally represented by a single assignment unless recognizing an enduring achievement. Preference is given to nominees who are Nationally Board-Certified Leaders.

Nominees must have a history of notable contributions in positions at or above the operational level of an organization to include branch and/or division chiefs, or personnel serving in positions of responsibility that would otherwise constitute the position of a branch or division chief.
At any given time, only 49% of members in the Honorable Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle will be silver awardees.

9f9b139b-216f-4efc-b056-4b929b5b2a8e.description: National Board Certification is the most respected professional certification available in Leadership education and training, and provides numerous benefits to employers, students and organizations. It was designed to develop, retain and recognize accomplished leaders and to generate ongoing improvement and develop organizations and individuals nationwide.
9f9b139b-216f-4efc-b056-4b929b5b2a8e.name: Nationally Board-Certified Leader

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates complete a computer-based live virtual oral assessment that require candidates to demonstrate knowledge leadership practices for their content area in leadership. Candidates must demonstrate knowledge of developmentally appropriate content, which is necessary for leading across the full range of their community of practice.

Candidates complete a portfolio entry that requires the candidate to gather and analyze information about their individual strengths and weaknesses in leadership and use that information to design instruction that would help someone to overcome those same challenges and capitalize on their strengths.

Candidates complete a portfolio entry that requires a video recording of interactions between the leader and junior leader. Candidates also submit written commentary in which they describe, analyze and reflect on their leadership interactions with their peers and junior leaders.

The final portfolio entry requires candidates to demonstrate evidence of their abilities as an effective and reflective practitioner in developing others, their use of assessments and effectively planning for and positively impacting their peers and junior leaders to grow.
Candidates must possess a bachelor degree from an accredited institution before completing their certification.
Candidates are required to have held a leadership position within their organization or others for no less than 3-years by the conferring of their certification.

f34e4f28-d7f4-4273-b4bf-9600dcb02d6e.description: National Board Certification is the most respected professional certification available in Leadership education and training, and provides numerous benefits to employers, students and organizations. It was designed to develop, retain and recognize accomplished leaders and to generate ongoing improvement and develop organizations and individuals nationwide. The Coach designation is reserved vetted and accredited Board-Certified Leaders.
f34e4f28-d7f4-4273-b4bf-9600dcb02d6e.name: Nationally Board-Certified Leader Coach

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Board-Certified Leader Coaches must hold an active designation as a Nationally Board-Certified Leader. This is accomplished by completing the four components below and completing maintenance of certification requirements. Once certified, the Board-Certified Leader undergoes a vetting and accreditation process with the National Board.

Component 1. Candidates complete a computer-based live virtual oral assessment that require candidates to demonstrate knowledge leadership practices for their content area in leadership. Candidates must demonstrate knowledge of developmentally appropriate content, which is necessary for leading across the full range of their community of practice.

Component 2. Candidates complete a portfolio entry that requires the candidate to gather and analyze information about their individual strengths and weaknesses in leadership and use that information to design instruction that would help someone to overcome those same challenges and capitalize on their strengths.

Component 3. Candidates complete a portfolio entry that requires a video recording of interactions between the leader and junior leader. Candidates also submit written commentary in which they describe, analyze and reflect on their leadership interactions with their peers and junior leaders.

Component 4. The final portfolio entry requires candidates to demonstrate evidence of their abilities as an effective and reflective practitioner in developing others, their use of assessments and effectively planning for and positively impacting their peers and junior leaders to grow.
Candidates must possess a bachelor degree from an accredited institution before completing their certification.
Candidates are required to have held a leadership position within their organization or others for no less than 3-years by the conferring of their certification.

5ae9f64d-e5ac-4f4d-8fa9-e801958c7b09.description: Holders of this credential have demonstrated the ability to work iteratively across Sprints to create aspects usable increments. They understand the work required for Sprint Planning, building a Sprint Backlog, participating in Daily Scrums, and adapting a Sprint Goal. They have demonstrated their ability to establish a Definition of Done to ensure all increments meet the agreed quality measures required for the product, and are ready to be integrated as a valued team member on a Scrum Team.
5ae9f64d-e5ac-4f4d-8fa9-e801958c7b09.name: Altitude Scrum Developer Certification

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Professional Scrum Developer course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Agile Principles, Agile Methods, Scrum Methods, Scrum Roles, Scrum Project Phases, Collaboration and Team Dynamics, Architecture and Design, Refactoring, Test-Driven Development (TDD), & Integrating Continuously.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

ef351c10-dba9-4c8d-ac50-3024d7d03798.description: Earners of this badge have a practical, working knowledge of Scrum that equips them to implement and work in a Scrum environment. They are facilitators who ensure that the Scrum Team is provided with an environment conducive to completing projects successfully. The earning is capable of guiding, facilitating, and teaching Scrum practices to everyone involved in a project; clearing impediments for the team; and ensuring that Scrum processes are being followed.
ef351c10-dba9-4c8d-ac50-3024d7d03798.name: Altitude Scrum Master Certification

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Professional Scrum Master course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Agile Principles, Agile Methods, Scrum Methods, Scrum Roles, Scrum Project Phases, Scaling Scrum, Scrum Master's Role in a Scrum Project, Scrum Master responsibilities to the team, stakeholders, and product owner, Implementing Scrum, and Transitioning an organization to Scrum.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

557f7ff0-df70-4059-9666-4982489e2d36.description: Earners of this badge represent the interests of the stakeholders in the Scrum Team. They are responsible for ensuring clear communication of product or service functionality requirements. They are capable of prioritizing the requirements from the point of view of an end user, for maximum business benefit, defining the Acceptance Criteria, and ensuring those criteria are met.
557f7ff0-df70-4059-9666-4982489e2d36.name: Altitude Scrum Product Owner Certification

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Professional Scrum Product Owner course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Agile Principles, Agile Methods, Scrum Methods, Scrum Roles, Scrum Project Phases, Scaling Scrum, Scrum Product Owner's Role in a Scrum Project, Scrum Master responsibilities to the team, and stakeholders, and building and managing the Product Backlog.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

ee25b79f-56da-40fa-8e06-8533602f1a6b.description: Project Altitude's ITIL4 Managing Professional Boot Camp is a combination of ITIL® 4 that streamlines all four modules that are part of ITIL® 4 MP Training Program. The ITIL® 4 Managing Professional Course, has been created for IT practitioners working within technology and digital teams across businesses. The Managing Professional (MP) stream provides practical and technical knowledge about how to run successful IT enabled services, teams and workflows.
ee25b79f-56da-40fa-8e06-8533602f1a6b.name: Boot Camp for ITIL4® Managing Professional (MP)

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual course Boot Camp for ITIL4® Managing Professional (MP) at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL® 4 Specialist: Create, Deliver and Support.
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL® 4 Strategist: Direct, Plan and Improve.
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL® 4 Specialist: Drive Stakeholder Value
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL® 4 Specialist: High-velocity IT.
Learners must hold the ITIL® 4 Foundations Credential to attend this boot-camp.

7c9b2f9e-1f94-4524-91a3-722375eb6bae.description: Project Altitude's ITIL4 Strategic Leader Boot Camp is a program that streamlines the modules for the ITIL4 Strategic Leader Program. ITIL4 Strategic Leader (ITIL SL) is a stream of two modules that are part of ITIL 4, the next evolution of ITIL. ITIL SL recognizes the value of ITIL, not just for IT operations, but for all digitally-enabled services. Becoming an ITIL 4 Strategic Leader demonstrates that the earner has a clear understanding of how IT influences and directs business strategy.
7c9b2f9e-1f94-4524-91a3-722375eb6bae.name: Boot Camp for ITIL4® Strategic Leader (SL)

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual course Boot Camp for ITIL4® Managing Professional (MP) at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL 4 Strategist Direct, Plan and Improve.
Complete the certification courses and exams for ITIL 4 Leader Digital and IT Strategy.
Learners must hold the ITIL® 4 Foundations Credential to attend this boot-camp.

3f782ae4-96c9-43d3-a321-13b48199d8ed.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed Project Altitude's Agile Project Management Boot Camp. This boot camp takes a multi-disciplinary approach to ensuring proficiency in delivering Agile and Scrum practices throughout an organization.
3f782ae4-96c9-43d3-a321-13b48199d8ed.name: Boot Camp in Agile Project Management

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual course Boot-Camp in Agile Project Management at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute
Complete the certification courses and exams for Scrum Product Owner & Scrum Master
Complete the certification course and exam for Certified Professional in DevOps or Certified Leader in DevOps
Complete the requirements for Certified Agile Coach

ee37fc0f-6bd8-4621-b857-38f6e7550fc3.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed Project Altitude's Project and Process Management Boot Camp. This boot camp takes a multi-disciplinary approach to Project Management that ensure the earner's proficiency in tackling whatever task, project, and portfolio is presented.
ee37fc0f-6bd8-4621-b857-38f6e7550fc3.name: Boot Camp in Project and Process Management

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The International Association for Six Sigma Certification
The Council for Six Sigma Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in Lean Six Sigma.
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in Scrum.
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in DevOps, ITIL, or PMP.
Complete the requirements for Certified Professional in Project Management.
Complete the virtual course Boot-Camp in Agile Project Management at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

caddcf92-f166-47d8-8520-4f76a49f38f8.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed Project Altitude's Technology Management Boot Camp. This boot camp takes a multi-disciplinary approach to Technology Management to ensure its earners are well versed in all areas of Software Project Management and Technology Service Management
caddcf92-f166-47d8-8520-4f76a49f38f8.name: Boot Camp in Technology Management

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual course Boot-Camp in Technology Management at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in ITIL4.
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in DevOps.
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification in Scrum.
Complete the requirements for Certified Professional in Technology Management.

9385a064-c1e1-49fe-9351-d866bcf30789.description: Earners of this badge have completed 35 contact hours of audio, video training & exam practice In project management with Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, in association with Velociteach, Inc.
9385a064-c1e1-49fe-9351-d866bcf30789.name: Certified Associate in Project Management Exam Preparation Course 6th Edition

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: This course covered all 49 Processes found in A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge, (PMBOK® Guide), 6th Edition, Project Management Institute, Inc., 2017, and the 3 domains found in the PMP Exam Content Outline, (ECO), Project Management Institute, Inc., 2019.
Completion of 3 - full length CAPM practice exams.

skills.name: Project Management Body Of Knowledge (PMBOK) Methodology

49516e0f-c88c-45da-b427-e0097fe6724f.description: Certified Coaches prepare Scrum practitioners to manage and implement the concepts of Scrum into complex projects, programs, and portfolios. It also provides practitioners the platform to become a Scrum Consultant.
49516e0f-c88c-45da-b427-e0097fe6724f.name: Certified Coach in Agile

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Hold a minimum of three certifications from the Agile certification portfolios. A minimum of one must be a Scrum certification: Scrum Developer, Scrum Master, Scrum Product Owner; and a minimum of one must be a DevOps certification: Additionally, DevOps Professional/fundamentals, and/or DevOps Leader.
3 - years of experience managing Scrum/Agile Projects.

e4818ae5-36af-45d8-9a4a-bc081ba92f22.description: Earners of this credential have sufficient knowledge, understanding of fundamental DevOps skills, and is able to work effectively with, or as a leading member of, a DevOps environment, analyzing and applying these skills and knowledge. Earners have demonstrated solid knowledge and understanding of DevOps terms, principles, tools and practices, as well as demonstrated their application skills of how to use these tools efficiently and effectively.
e4818ae5-36af-45d8-9a4a-bc081ba92f22.name: Certified Leader in DevOps

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Leader in DevOps course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Leadership for DevOps, Leading an organization in a DevOps transformation, Establishing DevOps, Clarifying & aligning business objectives, Creating a vision and strategy for transformation, Identifying and influencing vital stakeholders, Leading a culture of self-organized cross-functional teams, broadcast and Implement feedback, Enabling flow across the value streams, Leading innovation, & organizational resilience & sustainability.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

1c548dac-8f63-4c1a-be9e-43403f7d2110.description: Earners of this credential have a comprehensive understanding of both the complementary domains of Lean and Six Sigma. They are capable of employing tools and techniques to improve production processes, reduce waste and minimize defects in the end product with a greater focus on the practical implementation of these tool and techniques in the organization. Recipients are able to lead critical continuous process improvement projects in their respective fields.
1c548dac-8f63-4c1a-be9e-43403f7d2110.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The Council for Six Sigma Certification
International Association for Six Sigma Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, accredited by the International Association for Six Sigma Certification & the Council for Six Sigma Certification.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Six Sigma Basics, Six Sigma Fundamentals, Selecting Lean Six Sigma Projects, The Lean Enterprise, Process Definitions, Six Sigma Statistics, Measurement System Analysis, Process Capability, Patterns of Variation, Inferential Statistics, Hypothesis Testing with normal and non-normal data, Linear and Multiple Regressions, Full & Fractional Factorial Experimental Design, Lean Controls, Statistical Process Control and Control Plans.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

1675d7b1-1580-4d4f-b7d7-cf9649519ed8.description: Earners of this credential have a strong understanding of the various Six Sigma tools and techniques used to improve the production process and minimize defects in the end product. Earners have a comprehensive understanding of the basic core to advanced elements of Lean Six Sigma Methodology and an in-depth understanding of all aspects of the Lean Six Sigma Method including higher competence in subject matters contained within the phases of DMAIC.
1675d7b1-1580-4d4f-b7d7-cf9649519ed8.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma Green Belt

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The Council for Six Sigma Certification.
International Association for Six Sigma Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, accredited by the International Association for Six Sigma Certification & the Council for Six Sigma Certification.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Six Sigma Basics, Six Sigma Fundamentals, Selecting Lean Six Sigma Projects, The Lean Enterprise, Process Definitions, Six Sigma Statistics, Measurement System Analysis, Process Capability, Patterns of Variation, Inferential Statistics, Hypothesis Testing with normal and non-normal data, Linear and Multiple Regressions, Basic Experimental Design, Lean Controls, Statistical Process Control and Control Plans.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

7b1b0404-5c9b-4b61-88b6-5b452357ffbc.description: Earners of this credential are experts in the Six Sigma Body of Knowledge demonstrated proficiency through the completion of rigorous testing and the completion of multiple DMAIC and/or DMADV projects. Earners have a complete understanding of team leadership, team dynamics, curriculum development, and mentorship.
7b1b0404-5c9b-4b61-88b6-5b452357ffbc.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The Council for Six Sigma Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt Course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, accredited by the Council for Six Sigma Certification.
Completion of a Master Black Belt Project
Portfolio Review of at least three (3) Lean Six Sigma Black Belt projects.
150-Question Multiple Choice/True-False Exam in 240 minutes; applicant must score a 70%.
10-Question Open-Ended Question Exam
Develop one (1) unit of Lean Six Sigma curriculum
Mentorship of two (2) Black Belts and/or Champions, Executive.

86e84254-219e-4b48-ab11-13dd85f1850e.description: Earners of this credential have basic knowledge of Lean Six Sigma and are able participate as a valued member of a Six Sigma team. Earners are proficient at employing six sigma tools in the DMAIC process.
86e84254-219e-4b48-ab11-13dd85f1850e.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The Council for Six Sigma Certification
The International Association for Six Sigma Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt Course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, accredited by the International Association for Six Sigma Certification & the Council for Six Sigma Certification.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: Six Sigma Basics, Six Sigma Fundamentals, Selecting Lean Six Sigma Projects, The Lean Enterprise, Process Definitions, Six Sigma Statistics, Measurement System Analysis, Process Capability, Lean Controls, and Control Plans.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

486bee9b-08ff-428d-88dd-10c5186c6731.description: Earners of this credential are able to deliver effective DevOps through the 15 essential practices, especially in relation to well-established ITSM practices. Earners have sufficient knowledge, understanding and application of fundamental DevOps skills and are able to work effectively with, or as a member of, a DevOps environment.
486bee9b-08ff-428d-88dd-10c5186c6731.name: Certified Professional in DevOps

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Professional in DevOps course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: History and Need of DevOps, Key concepts of DevOps, Business Value of DevOps, Concepts underlying C.A.L.M.S., The Three Ways, continuous delivery, and the scope of the full stack, DevOps culture, transformational leadership and DevOps structure and teaming  Evolution of the DevOps Practices and the 15 Essential Practices of DevOps, Agile Project Management and Scrum Methodology, & Key concepts of cloud technology and, automation.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

f92fc182-fcda-45c1-8bc7-9ffe0ac61e47.description: Certified Professional in Project Management is a certification awarded to practitioners who have demonstrates proficiency in project management across a range of industries.
f92fc182-fcda-45c1-8bc7-9ffe0ac61e47.name: Certified Professional in Project Management

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete three or more Professional Level Certifications in project and/or process management to include but not limited to: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt or higher certification; ITIL4 Foundations or higher certification; Scrum Master/Scrum Product Owner or higher certification; Certified DevOps Leader; PMP Exam Prep 6th Edition + Agile or CAPM. Only one from each certification portfolio may be applied for this certification.
3 - years of project management experience.

e282d9c3-f8bc-4ff6-b4a5-778894bd97fb.description: Certified Professional in Technology Management is a certification awarded to practitioners who have demonstrates proficiency in technology management across a range of industries.
e282d9c3-f8bc-4ff6-b4a5-778894bd97fb.name: Certified Professional in Technology Management

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete three or more Professional Level Certifications in Technology Management at Project Altitude from the following list: ITIL4 Foundations or higher certification; Scrum Master or Scrum Product Owner or higher certification; and/or Certified DevOps Professional or higher. Only one from each certification portfolio may be applied for this certification.
3 - years of technology management experience.

3f02de6c-4f3b-4420-9a19-3bfda67b6d30.description: Earners of this badge appreciate the concepts of Agile development and Scrum and have the ability to not only act as part of a Scrum Team but also facilitate the adoption and training of Scrum principles and methodologies within their organization.
3f02de6c-4f3b-4420-9a19-3bfda67b6d30.name: Certified Scrum Trainer

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual courses within the Scrum portfolio at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification as a Scrum Developer
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification as a Scrum Master
Complete the certification courses and exams for a professional certification as a Scrum Product Owner.
3 - years of project management experience.

89541fa3-58c5-4a77-9365-c5e2bd14a728.description: Holders of this credential understand the concepts, terms, principles and tools used by a DevOps Engineer to clarify, plan and approach a DevOps Transformation, validate and sustain a DevOps transformation, how the DevOps Full Stack approach can be engaged and implemented within an organization and how it can be aligned to value delivery. In addition, they have demonstrated proficiency in the practices, & processes for automation and technology used for adapting DevOps within and organization.
89541fa3-58c5-4a77-9365-c5e2bd14a728.name: Certified Specialist in DevOps Engineering

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Specialist in DevOps Engineering course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.
Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: DevOps Essentials, DevOps Coordination, Key Practices of DevOps Organizations, The DevOps Engineer, and Deployment Pipeline Automation.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

ba84cb75-2362-4607-8e0c-c37c1e606db2.description: The credential confirms that the holder has sufficient knowledge, understanding and application of the key skills and tools for DevSecOps and is able to work effectively with, or as a leading member of, a DevOps team, analyzing and applying these skills and knowledge. Moreover, this credential is proof of the candidate's ability to mitigate typical security risks and effectively manage risk through key practices.
ba84cb75-2362-4607-8e0c-c37c1e606db2.name: Certified Specialist in DevSecOps

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual Certified Specialist in DevSecOps course from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Receive proficient marks in the following competencies: DevOps Essentials, Information Security, DevSecOps, Layer One – Security Education, Layer Two – Security by Design, Layer Three – Security Automation, and The Foundation for DevSecOps.
Pass the certification exam with a 70% or greater in all competencies.

2c1a68b8-2ec0-4895-a0fd-cbe5460b61bc.description: The Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle recognizes individuals who have contributed significantly to the promotion of leadership and education initiatives in ways that stand out in the eyes of the recipient's seniors, subordinates, and peers. These individuals demonstrate the highest standards of integrity and moral character, display an outstanding degree of professional competence, and serve their community of practice with distinction.
2c1a68b8-2ec0-4895-a0fd-cbe5460b61bc.name: Gold Member, Honorable Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

alignments.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: While the popular and prestigious Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle is designed as primarily an NBLC specific award, the NBLC recognizes that many others outside of the NBLC work diligently to promote the success of leadership, our mission, profession, and community. The legend of St. John Baptist de La Salle is a story of those who devote themselves wholeheartedly to their community, the development, and the success of others.

Awardees will have served in a variety of positions, with differing titles and occasionally a non-standard grade structure. The key criteria are distinguished service and what was accomplished to advance and improve their community of practice during that period of service. The intent is that the nominee will have served in a leadership position(s) and made significant and/or long-lasting contribution(s) to the community.
Nominees must have a career in leadership, education or service represented by a lifetime of service and significant contributions to the community and the NBLC.

Continued service to the community and the NBCL through various venues such as: Professional writing in journals or other professionally oriented publications; Professional speaking in support of the NBLC; Serving at a strategic level for their organization and/or community; Actively serving in the NBLC as a Board member, advisory group member, council member, or in active support of the Board through activities or initiatives.
At any given time, only 9% of members in the Honorable Order of St. John Baptist de La Salle will be gold awardees.

687b0c90-74e7-4921-a49f-20653aadfeb1.description: Earners of this badge have completed the virtual ITIL4 Foundations Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited. This course introduced candidates to the management of modern IT-enabled services, to provide them with an understanding of the common language and key concepts, and to show them how they can improve their work and the work of their organization with ITIL 4 guidance.
687b0c90-74e7-4921-a49f-20653aadfeb1.name: ITIL4 Foundations - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand the key concepts of technology service management. Understand how the ITIL guiding principles can help an organization adopt and adapt service management. Understand the four dimensions of technology service management. Understand the purpose and components of the ITIL service value system. Understand the activities of the service value chain, and how they interconnect. Know the purpose and key terms of 15 ITIL practices.
Complete the virtual ITIL4 Foundations Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

e84e9fff-a854-4169-89a2-017cc5b0be07.description: This course focused on the importance and challenges of creating a digital strategy to enable the success of a businesses and integrating it into the IT strategy and aligning it with the wider organization. It explored the use of the ITIL framework to support organizations in their digital transformation by providing a structured and flexible approach for addressing service management challenges and utilizing the potential of modern technology.
e84e9fff-a854-4169-89a2-017cc5b0be07.name: ITIL4 Leader: Digital & IT Strategy (DITS) - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual ITIL4 Leader: Digital & IT Strategy (DITS) - Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Demonstrate the use of the ITIL guiding principles in Digital and IT Strategy. Understand how to leverage digital strategy to react to digital disruption. Understand the relationship between the concepts of Digital and IT Strategy, the service value system and the service value chain, and how to utilize them to create value.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand how an organization uses Digital and IT Strategy to remain viable in environments disrupted by digital technology. Understand strategic approaches to achieve relevance and operational excellence. Understand the risks and opportunities of Digital and IT Strategy. Understand the techniques involved in defining and advocating for a Digital and IT Strategy. Understand how to implement a Digital and IT Strategy.
Candidate must hold the ITIL4 Foundations Credential to attend this course.

f715814b-324c-47fc-a044-dc71c604b437.description: The ITIL 4 Create, Deliver and Support (CDS) course provided the earner with an understanding on how to integrate different value streams and activities to create, deliver and support IT enabled products and services, and relevant practices, methods and tools.
f715814b-324c-47fc-a044-dc71c604b437.name: ITIL® 4 Specialist: Create, Deliver, and Support (CDS) - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual ITIL® 4 Specialist: Create, Deliver, and Support (CDS) - Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand how to plan and build a service value stream to create, deliver and support services. Know how relevant ITIL practices contribute to creation, delivery and support across the SVS and value streams. Know how to create, deliver and support services
Candidate must hold the ITIL4 Foundations Credential to attend this course.

f8843db5-1365-42f5-93e2-1ed389877ff8.description: The ITIL 4 Drive Stakeholder Value training program provided the earners of this badge with an understanding of all types of engagement and interactions between a service provider and their customers, users, suppliers and partners, including key CX, UX and journey mapping concepts.
f8843db5-1365-42f5-93e2-1ed389877ff8.name: ITIL® 4 Specialist: Drive Stakeholder Value (DSV) - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual ITIL® 4 Specialist: Drive Stakeholder Value (DSV) - Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand how customer journeys are designed. Know how to target markets and stakeholders. Know how to foster stakeholder relationships. Know how to shape demand and define service offerings. Know how to align expectations and agree details of services. Know how to onboard and offboard customers and users. Know how to act together to ensure continual value co-creation. Know how to realize and validate service value.

b5285f41-a6f2-4f5b-89d4-5388d22edd7c.description: This course provided the candidate with an understanding of the ways in which digital organizations and digital operating models function in high velocity environments, focusing on rapid delivery of products & services to obtain maximum value. The course ensures the candidates understanding of working practices such as Agile and Lean, and technical practices and technologies such as ‘the cloud’, automation, and automatic testing.
b5285f41-a6f2-4f5b-89d4-5388d22edd7c.name: ITIL® 4 Specialist: High Velocity IT (HVIT) - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual ITIL® 4 Specialist: High Velocity IT (HVIT) - Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand concepts regarding the high-velocity nature of the digital enterprise, including the demand it places on IT. Understand the digital product lifecycle in terms of the ITIL ‘operating model. Understand the importance of the ITIL guiding principles and other fundamental concepts for delivering high velocity. Know how to contribute to achieving value with digital products
Candidate must hold the ITIL4 Foundations Credential to attend this course.

3cf70e6c-0a3b-44d5-ad35-f2d4b279e203.description: The ITIL 4 Direct, Plan and Improve (DPI) Training program focused on providing its candidate with the practical skills necessary to create a ‘learning and improving’ IT organization, with a strong and effective strategic direction. Furthermore, it provided practitioners with a practical and strategic method for planning and delivering continual improvement with the necessary agility.
3cf70e6c-0a3b-44d5-ad35-f2d4b279e203.name: ITIL4 Strategist: Direct, Plan & Improve (DPI) - Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual ITIL4 Strategist: Direct, Plan & Improve (DPI) - Training Program at Project Altitude Career Skills Institute in association with 1WorldTraining, ATO of Axelos Limited.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand the key concepts of Direct, Plan & Improve. Understand the scope of what is to be directed and/or planned, and know how to use key principles and methods of direction and planning in that context. Understand the role of Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) and know how to integrate the principles and methods into the service value system.

Demonstrate understanding of the following concepts: Understand and know how to use the key principles and methods of continual improvement for all types of improvements. Understand and know how to use the key principles and methods of communication and organizational change management to direction, planning and improvement. Understand and know how to use the key principles and methods of measurement and reporting in direction, planning and improvement.
Candidate must hold the ITIL4 Foundations Credential to attend this course.

142acedc-2a62-44f6-b152-b5869f0339f4.description: The Program Management Professional credential from PMI is the next step after PMP. Our comprehensive workshop covers the Project Management process from beginning to end, honing your skills in the six prime focus areas: Governance, Prioritization, Escalation, Resource Management, Benefits Realization, and Stakeholder Management. As a PgMP® credential holder, you will be able to promote better integration and coordination of multiple projects for the overall benefit of the program.
142acedc-2a62-44f6-b152-b5869f0339f4.name: Program Management (PgMP) Exam Preparation Program

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the virtual 25-hour, Program Management (PgMP) Exam Preparation Program from Project Altitude Career Skills Institute.

Demonstrate understanding in the following areas: Five Program Management Performance Domains, organizational strategic objectives, transfer and sustainability of benefits, resource and stakeholder management, program life cycle management, program management governance, and program risk management.

b2b2e5a1-08f8-4ca8-a14c-e203fbb4376b.description: Earners of this badge have completed 47 contact hours of audio, video training & exam practice In project management with Project Altitude Career Skills Institute, in association with Velociteach, Inc.
b2b2e5a1-08f8-4ca8-a14c-e203fbb4376b.name: Project Management Professional Exam Preparation Course 6th Edition + Agile

issuer.summary: issued by The National Board for Leadership Certification

entity.name: The National Board for Leadership Certification

badge_template_activities.title: This course covered all 49 Processes found in A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge, (PMBOK® Guide), 6th Edition, Project Management Institute, Inc., 2017, and the 3 domains found in the PMP Exam Content Outline, (ECO), Project Management Institute, Inc., 2019, and explore the traditional waterfall methodologies as well as both agile and hybrid approaches.
Completion of 3 - full length PMP practice exams.

skills.name: Project Management Body Of Knowledge (PMBOK) Methodology
